fields.description:
See HIVE-11705. This just contains the hbase-metastore-specific methods from that patch

NO PRECOMMIT TESTS
fields.summary: create a self-contained translation for SARG to be used by metastore

comments.body: The patch on top of HIVE-11705
need hbase-metastore branch to be merged into master, or the other way around to commit this
The same patch to run HiveQA now that the branch is merged
